### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_location VARCHAR(255)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Events SET event_name='Updated Name' WHERE event_id=1;
